name: Haunted!
description:
You wake up in a forest. You have that strange feeling that you're not alone...
You better get resources before the night comes. AND DO NOT LET THE SHADOWS GET CLOSE!

You can collect small rocks and plants for stone and wood, and craft tools to mine big boulders and chop down trees. Torches last for a short amount of time but may help you escape the darkness. 

Game made by: Roncata (programming and sound effects), Driceyz (3D art).

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Inventory: I, V
Crafting: C
Pause: esc

Submitted to Brackey's game jam 2022.2
